body.name: HCHQHS Adjustable 6 Tier Open Bookcase, Rustic Farmhouse Book Shelves, Industrial Wood and Black Metal Bookshelves, Mid Century Bookcase for Home Office Living Room Bedroom
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 49 mins
features: 【Adjustable Shelves】The middle shelves of this industrial bookshelf is adjustable, allowing you to customize each shelf to your own requirements.
【Edge Protection】Designed with edge protection to prevent accidental tipping and suitable for storing fragile items such as seasoning and glass storage jars.

【8 Storage Hooks & Anti-Falling】The 5 tier bookshelf have different iron frame designs on each side, providing versatile storage options for products of various heights including books and ornaments. Additionally, 8 multipurpose hooks are included to hang headphones, toys, or other small decor.

【Easy Assembly and Cleaning】Clear and detailed instructions and numbered parts are included for easy assembly. The open bookcase can be easily cleaned with a wet rag. 4 adjustable feet pads are designed to level the shelf on uneven floors and prevent scratches.
【Durable and Eco-Friendly】The tall book shelf made of premier metal and high-quality MDF, our standing shelf is US CARB P2 standard compliant, ensuring no bad odors.

Adjustable Height The height of the shelves will be adjustable. Safety Shelf The safety shelf board can be installed at the top or middle of the bookshelf as required, to prevent injuries to personnel or damage to items. 8 Hooks Included Receive 8 hooks for free. They can provide you with additional storage space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars VERY nice shelf for around $100. Good buy!
reviews.reviewText: I put it together by myself in about an hour, so not too bad, but not to easy. The final product was worth the time and effort though. It looks great and once the tie strap is connected to the wall behind it, it's very stable for a small width shelf this tall. I'm thinking about a second one now right beside this one in my space, as the six shelves didn't last as long as I thought they would., the are all full now and I still have need for more. So, I'm going to get another when I can and put it right beside this one. So, that's a good review from me. Unless you splurge for solid wood instead of particle board type shelves, this one is very nice for 2024 sorta cheap. Just wish it had a twin next to it... :-) Soon...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These shelves are beautiful and very sturdy. They serve our needs perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I thought the size was alil bigger than it was going to be. But its nice and easy enough to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Higher quality and better than expected
reviews.reviewText: We absolutely love this shelving unit. It is higher quality than most self assembly units I’ve bought from Amazon, Ikea, Walmart. The finish almost looks like real wood! The bars are very sturdy, maybe iron.It’s a perfect shelving unit for my extra kitchen gadgets.I have to warn people though that it is both very easy and very hard to assemble. It takes time just because there’s about 70 screws to make tighten. Another problem is that too I have to pay careful attention to the numbers and letters in the assembly manual otherwise it is very easy to mid up the longer screws with the shorter screws, in which case you might have to start all over :D Also the bars really need to be facing the right direction or you won’t be able to add the supports to make the unit even more sturdy. I found that the attachments for wall attachment was unnecessary for us since it was very sturdy and not wobbly and highly unlikely to fall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well as a liquor shelf due to adjustable height shelves.
reviews.reviewText: I needed a good sturdy shelf to store my whisky collection, and this has accomplished that job nicely. I especially like how the shelves have raised panels on the sides and back to help prevent bottles from sliding off where they should not go.Also another feature that made this work well is that the shelves are each slightly adjustable in height. This allowed me to add a few inches on a couple of the shelves to accommodate some of the unusually taller bottles.All in all I am very pleased with this. It works well, looks great, and holds everything very nicely!

reviews.reviewText: I love this bookshelf. It did take a minute to build but I am really happy with it so far

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice bookshelf if it holds up to the weight
reviews.reviewText: I needed a bookshelf for my collection of college and high-school textbooks (not mine; I'm not a graduate but I'm using them for studies now). These are big, tall, heavy books so I needed something that would hold but I didn't want something too heavy or large. This was perfect. The adjustment range on the individual shelves left a capacity for book height from about 11 inches for most of the shortest and 13.5 inches at the tallest.When you adjust most of the shelves to the 12- or 13.5-inch height, that left one shelf with a 10 inch height, which is fine for one shelf to take the shorter books. I would have loved this even more if it could be adjusted for 13-inch height to accommodate the tallest textbooks. This, literally, would have only taken about 2 more inches of height overall.The description claims metal and wood construction but the only wood in this is the sawdust from real woodwork pressed into particle board - though the quality of the paper wrap over the particle board is great and it actually looks like a high-quality furniture-grade, 11-layer, plywood... But don't be fooled; it's not.Because the shelves are particle board, it becomes important that the only thing holding them in are these very course-threaded furniture screws; you've probably seen and installed them by the dozens before. And you'll install them by the dozens in this unit as well. In assembling the sides and back to the shelves. These screws go through the metal frame before going into the shelves to mount the shelf, meaning that just over an inch of screw goes into the particle board to hold the 75 pounds that each shelf is supposed to carry.It is these screws into particle board, shortened effectively by the thickness of the frame, that lead to the 4-star review because I just don't think it's going to hold up. To earn 5 stars, I should not only like the shelves but should also be confident that it's going to last. I don't have that confidence. And by the time I've owned it long enough to know it is going to hold up, the product will be off the market and reviews, good or otherwise, won't matter.So, consider the positives and the limitations and you can make your own choice. For me, I'm glad I bought this. So far, it's definitely better to have my piles of textbooks on these shelves instead of stacked on the floor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Mostly working just fine
reviews.reviewText: Looks nice, went together fine, arrived in timely fashion. Hooks are a bit smaller than expected & of course, it's an inexpensive piece of furniture, but it looks nice & is doing the job.
Is exactly what I wanted will buy again
